ohu pawasana paridi eya walangu wanne suwishala chithrapata kandarawak athi batahira ratawalataya.eeta wada parani chithrapata dijital sanyuktha thati washayen nikuth kirima ema nirmana karyata watinakamak labena kriya patipatiyaki.‘banda nagarayata paminima’ chithrapataye sho kad ekakapa boho denaku daka nathi loka sinamawe aarambhaka chalana chithrapata 10 pamana narambaimata hakiwima wishesha waraprasadayaki.lumiyer karmantha shalawen sewaka sewikawan pitawa yama, kuda bilindakuta aahara kawima, siyotat dumriya polata dumriyak senduwima, kad kridawe yedima, mal panthiyakata wathura damima, ponrayis ha meri arwin depalage haduwa, pred ootge kiwisuma wani eekiya sinama darshana ha ‘da gret tren robari’ nam lowa prathama wruththanthayath eewa athara weyi.danata mema sinama darshana punchi thirayen dakiya haki namudu samanya milimitar 35 prakshepana pramanayen narambaime awasthawa langadima gordan da silwa sapaya denu atha.
